article_title: Delayed Tax Refunds, The EITC & How We're Getting It Wrong

article_metadata.description: Millions of taxpayers are filing tax returns early in search of a refund. Many are finding that refunds may be delayed and there's no explanation. Is it an administrative delay? Are we running out of money? Or do we just have the policy all wrong?
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb
